title: Lamb koftas
ingredients: ['350g extra lean minced lamb', '1 egg', '2 large garlic cloves, crushed', '1 tbsp chopped fresh oregano, or 1 tsp dried', '1 tbsp chopped fresh thyme, or ½ tsp dried', '1 large onion, finely chopped', '100g fresh wholemeal breadcrumbs', '1 tbsp olive oil', '25g fresh herbs (such as basil, flat-leaf parsley and mint), chopped', '6 spring onions, thinly sliced', '50g rocket', 'To serve', '6 large pitta breads', '1 lemon, cut into 6 wedges', '½ cucumber, thinly sliced', '6 tbsp low-fat natural yoghurt']
